titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the ease of the citty of Oxford, and suhurbs [sic], of the connty [sic] of Oxford, of unnecessary persons lodging or abiding there.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At foot of page: Ginen [sic] at Our court at Oxford, the twentieth day of Ianuary, in the Eighteenth yeare of Our reigne. God save the King.
Place and date of publication from Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
